root.name: Go! Go! Beckham! Adventure On Soccer Island
root.description: OverviewGo! Go Beckham! Adventure On Soccer Island is a platformer in same vein as Shaq-Fu and Michael Jordan: Chaos in the Windy City, in that it puts a sports personality in a preposterous and surreal situation.PlotThe evil Mr. Woe has attacked the once peaceful Soccer Island. Woe has transformed all of the islands animals into evil monsters. David Beckham is then tasked with defeating Mr. Woe and saving the land of Soccer Island and its inhabitants.

similar_games.game: Super Mario World: Super Mario Advance 2
